name: Adventures in Angular
description: Keep up with the best tools and latest changes in Angular

name: Angular Air
description: A live stream podcast all about Angular, the ecosystem, and community.

name: Angular Master Podcast
description: This podcast is designed for Angular developers at every level, offering insights into building production-ready applications, architecture, and performance best practices.

name: The Angular Plus Show
description: The Angular Plus Show is the home of ng-conf's official all-Angular podcast. Come here to stay up to date on the latest changes in the Angular community.

name: Angularidades
description: Podcast con invitados hispanohablantes conversando sobre temas alrededor del framework Angular.

name: Ng-News
description: The latest updates from the Angular community within 100 seconds every week.

name: Angular Catch-Up
description: Welcome to Angular Catch-Up – your ultimate hub for everything Angular!

name: Angular Japan User Group | Angular 日本ユーザー会
description: Angular日本ユーザー会は日本のAngular開発者によるユーザーコミュニティです！ ナレッジの共有やイベントの開催、ドキュメントの翻訳などを中心に活動しています。

name: Startup Angular
description: Startup Angularとは？ Angularをメインに使っているスタートアップによる、Angular開発の知見などを発信するイベントです。
